questions.question_text: Which response code family is returned when further action must be taken to complete the request?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
HTTP status codes of 3xx are redirections

Selected Answer: A
This could refer to code 202.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/202

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

questions.question_text: Which Cisco compute management platform enables the management of Cisco UCS, Cisco HyperFlex, Pure Storage, and Cisco Network Insights from a single platform?

discussion.content:
Add a test > Run tests (should fail) > Write some code > Run tests (should pass) > Refactor the code
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Test-driven_development#Test-driven_development_cycle

add a test
run the test 
write some code 
run the test again
refactor the code

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

Drag and drop the steps from the left into the order on the right to create a test-driven development cycle. Some options are used more than once.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

questions.question_text: A customer is building a new DevOps business. The customer plans to deploy a modern version control system that supports multiple branches. Then the customer will aim to integrate into a Cl/CD pipeline for automated provisioning and agile development. What should the customer use first for the version control system?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A development team is creating a Python application. After several days of work, a developer notices several pycache folders and creates a Bash script to clean up the folders. What being automated by the Bash script?

choices.C: Delete all the files in the __pycache__ folders.
choices.B: Find all the empty __pycache__ folders and delete them.
choices.D: Find all the files named PWD and delete them.
